file_content.text: All right. Hold your gloating. Get it over with.
Make your peace. It is over.
Gladly.
Ask for mercy. I might grant it.
Save yourself. Beg.
I don't think I'd be convincing.
You're awfully eager to die.
Didn't expect you to quit.
No, I'm just disinclined to make a show of it.
Ruger! Come in, Ellis Ruger. This is Warden Graal.
We're taking fire and can't reach your position. What's your status?
Wrong question, Warden. Instead ask yourself, what would you give to have him back?
He's my prisoner.
Is this a joke? Who's on this frequency?
Bad news, warden. You're going to need a new peacekeeper.
He's dead, or will be soon.
Wait, wait. We can negotiate this.
I've seen you on our cameras. You're with the Imperials.
Roger that. This is Ellis Ruger. Wish I could help, but I'm busy dying for a worthless cause. Over.
Hello, warden. [Imitate Ruger]
You're not Ruger! What's going on?
Wait. I've seen you on our cameras.
What do you want?
My only desire is to watch your face as I do this.
Bloodshed. [Kill Ruger]
You monster! Ellis Ruger... he was the last hope for law and order on Belsavis!
I won't forget this. Warden Graal out.
I'll take a ransom. One big enough to be worth your friend here. Then he leaves Belsavis--forever.
Credits. And him off my back.
Fine. I'll arrange a drop-off.
Listen to yourself, warden. Don't give this scum the satisfaction!
Ellis Ruger--you are relieved of duty on Belsavis. Report to me for debriefing, and medical attention.
I'll transmit the ransom to your base--but lay another finger on Ruger and I'll retract every credit.
Now go. Enjoy your payoff while you can.
Well, now.
There's two ways you can leave, Imperial: cuffed down or feet first.
There's two ways you can leave, hunter: cuffed down or feet first.
There's two ways you lot can leave: in cuffs or on gurneys.
I'm walking away from this. You won't be so lucky.
You've got it backwards.
Feet first it is.
I'll enjoy this.
It might happen. But it sure ain't going to be fun.
All the Empire wants on this planet is to operate without hassle. We could deal.
We can work something out.
I'd sooner kiss the wrong end of a Hutt. Pull your weapon.
